actions.text: Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for agreeing to Senate amendment numbered 1 and the Senate amendment to the title; and disagreeing to Senate amendment numbered 2 to H.R. 10161, a private bill.

summary.text: Expresses the House of Representatives' agreement to a certain Senate amendment and disagreement to another Senate amendment to H.R. 10161 (A bill for the relief of Eastern Telephone Supply and Manufacturing, Incorporated).

titles.title: A resolution providing for agreeing to Senate amendment numbered 1 and the Senate amendment to the title; and disagreeing to Senate amendment numbered 2 to H.R. 10161, a private bill.
